message.content:
cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.HC

This paper deals with the problem of identifying trolls in online communities, which is a common issue in social media and online communication. The paper uses machine learning techniques such as clustering and anomaly detection to profile users and identify trolls based on their behavior. This falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI), as well as natural language processing (cs.CL) since the paper deals with textual data. Additionally, the paper involves data mining and analysis (cs.CY), cybersecurity (cs.CR), and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) since it deals with user behavior and online communities.
